name: UINavigationBar
desc: Navigational controls that display in a bar along the top of the screen, usually in conjunction with a navigation controller.

items.name: protocol UINavigationBarDelegate
items.desc: Methods that a navigation bar calls before and after it modifies its stack of navigation items.

items.name: func pushItem(UINavigationItem, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Pushes the given navigation item onto the navigation bar's stack and updates the UI.

items.name: func popItem(animated: Bool) -> UINavigationItem?
items.desc: Pops the top item from the navigation bar's stack and updates the UI.

items.name: func setItems([UINavigationItem]?, animated: Bool)
items.desc: Replaces the navigation items currently managed by the navigation bar with the specified items.

items.name: var items: [UINavigationItem]?
items.desc: An array of navigation items managed by the navigation bar.

items.name: var topItem: UINavigationItem?
items.desc: The navigation item at the top of the navigation bar’s stack.

items.name: var backItem: UINavigationItem?
items.desc: The navigation item that is immediately below the topmost item on a navigation bar’s stack.

items.name: var prefersLargeTitles: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the title displays in a large format.

items.name: var standardAppearance: UINavigationBarAppearance
items.desc: The appearance settings for a standard-height navigation bar.

items.name: var compactAppearance: UINavigationBarAppearance?
items.desc: The appearance settings for a compact-height navigation bar.

items.name: var scrollEdgeAppearance: UINavigationBarAppearance?
items.desc: The appearance settings for the navigation bar when the edge of scrollable content aligns with the edge of the navigation bar.

items.name: var compactScrollEdgeAppearance: UINavigationBarAppearance?
items.desc: The appearance settings for a compact-height navigation bar when the edge of scrollable content aligns with the edge of the navigation bar.

items.name: var isTranslucent: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the navigation bar is translucent.
